archimate:Requirement.name: SY.2.1.2e: e) the capacity requirements of systems and networks (e.g. the projected number of users, normal and peak volumes of work to be handled, response times and transmission rates)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
